block.p: Anka Mira Laszlo and William Abbott Paine are to be married today by Kimberly A. Thompson, a California marriage commissioner, at the Andretti Winery in Napa, Calif.

The bride, 31, works in San Francisco as an independent educational consultant providing advice on private school placement. She is also a candidate for a doctorate in counseling psychology from the University of San Francisco. She graduated from Duke University and received a master's degree in counseling and school psychology from Tufts University. Her father, Dr. Arthur M. Laszlo of Easton, Pa., retired as the director of radiology at Warren Hospital in Phillipsburg, N.J. Her mother, Dr. Ingrid Maria Laszlo of Bethlehem, Pa., is a retired pediatrician who worked for the Phillipsburg school district and St. Luke's Hospital in Bethlehem.
Anka Mira Laszlo and William Abbott Paine are to be married today by Kimberly A. Thompson, a California marriage commissioner, at the Andretti Winery in Napa, Calif.

The bride, 31, works in San Francisco as an independent educational consultant providing advice on private school placement. She is also a candidate for a doctorate in counseling psychology from the University of San Francisco. She graduated from Duke University and received a master's degree in counseling and school psychology from Tufts University. Her father, Dr. Arthur M. Laszlo of Easton, Pa., retired as the director of radiology at Warren Hospital in Phillipsburg, N.J. Her mother, Dr. Ingrid Maria Laszlo of Bethlehem, Pa., is a retired pediatrician who worked for the Phillipsburg school district and St. Luke's Hospital in Bethlehem.

The bridegroom, 32, is an assistant vice president in institutional bond sales with the San Francisco office of Spear, Leeds & Kellogg, a securities brokerage and specialist firm. He graduated from Georgetown University, and is a son of Robert S. Paine of Wellfleet, Mass., and the late Cynthia Ryan Paine. Until last year, the bridegroom's parents owned and operated Paine's Campground in Wellfleet.
